title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite - NilIntroduction: Historical perspective, scope, structural novelty and architecture synthesis and processing of nanostured materials: Synthesis from vapor, liquid and solid states - chemical synthesis and processing of particles, films, coatings, and self-assembled structures. Mechano-chemical synthesis methods and severe plastic deformation. Thermal spray processing of nanocrystalline materials, Nanocrystalline powder consolidation methods and bulk nanomaterials, Electrodeposited/co-deposited nanocrystalline materials, Carbon nanotubes, Bulk metallic glasses.Properties and applications of nanostructured materials: Diffusion, Reactions with gas and liquid, Catalysis and electrocatalysis, Gas storage and sensing, Mechanical behavior of nanocrystalline metals and nanocomposites.
